cloud.name: THEAMI
cloud.desc:
During a routine scan, Nova uncovered a forgotten vault deep in the cloud—part of an old project codenamed ima. Buried in metadata logs, she spotted a long string: 07cc411e2ef775215. Curious, she traced it back to an archive.

Inside was a single note: “To unlock the sky, speak the words: CloudCTF2025!”

Nova whispered them into the terminal. The vault opened.

Some doors were never meant to close.

Author: JediMindTricks

crypto.name: Diff EQ Revenge
crypto.desc:
A brilliant mathematician once hid their secrets in the curvature of numbers. Two strange graphs were recovered from their notes — they appear smooth, deliberate... almost too perfect.

We believe these graphs encode something — perhaps a message? The more you think, the clearer things may become.

Can you decode the secrets buried in their slopes?

Author: 5h1kh4r

crypto.name: Too Small I Guess
crypto.desc:
I have 3 values but I don’t know if it makes sense to you

Author:~ 5h1kh4r

crypto.name: Trixie Prixie
crypto.desc:
The Power of Friendship and Maffs!

Author:~ 5h1kh4r

forensic.name: Author Ki PFP
forensic.desc:
Hey! Here is my PFP and I love using it everywhere. I wonder how you can make out the flag from this though…

Author: 5h1kh4r

forensic.name: Disk Message
forensic.desc: My friends likes to send me cryptic messages. This time he sent something related to disks! Can you find what he wants to say?

forensic.name: Disk Message 2
forensic.desc: You that it was that easy? try again......

forensic.name: Logarithms
forensic.desc: I was studying about logarithms and suddenly thought of making this challenge. Don’t know how both are related though

misc.name: BADC0DE
misc.desc:
An internal tool used to generate time-based secrets has been leaked. The developers insist it's safe because the secret changes every minute. What they forgot is that hackers are magicians and exploitation is their magic i.e. they can turn back the time.

Author:~ awwfensive

misc.name: Takiya
misc.desc:
Beneath the sheets, in the hush of the night, something waits in one endless line. Will you stay awake long enough to find it?

Author:~ wh1t3r0se

rev.name: Diff EQ
rev.desc:
This binary seems to do alot of operations and with functions with 2 letter names? Is this a sign by him?

Author:~ 5h1kh4r

rev.name: XORyy
rev.desc:
I found this program in the trashbin, does this belong there?
